resources.string:
Thank you for using the CodeBook app!

Email: XuanRanDev@qq.com

You can find more information about the project on our GitHub page.

When exporting data, the program will encrypt all data stored in the database using AES256 and export it as a TXT file. 

When importing data, you need to enter the import password. Only after the password is successfully verified will the data be imported.


* You can consider the salt value as an additional encryption password for the data. Be sure to save your salt value when exporting data. The salt value is randomly generated each time you export, and it will not be visible after export. You will need to enter the salt value used during generation when importing. The same password will produce different encryption results under different salt values. If the salt value is lost, the data cannot be recovered.

First of all, thank you very much for your donation. It is your support that motivates the project author to continue maintaining it.

You can click the button below to open the Alipay donation page directly, or take a screenshot to save the QR code image and use WeChat/Alipay to scan the code for donation.

(Left Alipay/Right WeChat).

CodeBook requires you to specify an encryption method.

Fingerprint method: Your device needs to be on Android 11 or above. You need to authorize your fingerprint when using it. CodeBook will use the high-strength encryption algorithm generated by the operating system to encrypt/decrypt your data. You need to authorize your fingerprint every time you start it. (Only when the device supports fingerprints)

Password method: CodeBook will require you to provide a password, then use this password as a random seed to generate a high-strength encryption key to encrypt/decrypt your data. You need to enter this password every time you start it.
Your device does not support fingerprint or fingerprint recognition is temporarily unavailable
Please use fingerprint verification for identity authentication
Please enter the data decryption password
If the data decryption password is lost, the data cannot be recovered.
Please enter the password to set
If the password is forgotten, all data will be lost.
Password verification error, please try again
Data cannot be recovered after deletion. Confirm delete?
Remark information is stored unencrypted and cannot be edited after creation. Please understand.
Your biometric authentication has expired, please re-authenticate.
For security reasons, the fingerprint method currently only supports Android 11 and above

I have carefully read and agree to the CodeBook User Agreement, understand the implementation of CodeBook's encryption algorithm, and agree that any data loss or leakage under any circumstances is not related to the developer.
Biometric authentication has been cancelled or not passed, data cannot be loaded.
